short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load Amazon Smile when you navigate to an Amazon page, in order to donate a portion of your purchase to FCSN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Load Amazon Smile when you navigate to an Amazon page, in order to donate a portion of your purchase to FCSN. So you don't have to enter smile.amazon.com every time.

Note: Before you go to amazon shopping, please visit : https://smile.amazon.com/ch/77-0446853
That will make sure your donation will go to FCSN.



BTW: FCSN website: https://fcsn1996.org/

if you have any issues, send me email : wangqi0316@gmail.com
